title: Lesson Study (LS)-Based Elementary Mathematics Mental Arithmetic Pedagogy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and understanding of general pedagogy
context.additional_context: A Practice-Centered Course Where Preservice Teachers Improve Elementary Mental Arithmetic Instruction Methods Through Five Lesson Study Cycles. Analysis of Learner-Instructor Interaction Transcripts and Student Work as Portfolios

learning_goals: Through five instructional cycles, learners can improve at least three teaching strategies based on learner responses
Learners can design at least two mental arithmetic teaching methods applying theoretical concepts (uncertainty management, pedagogical heterogeneity)
Learners can create and execute lesson improvement plans reflecting peer and instructor feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
